name: Robber on Rails
description:
Play as a cannon on rails, attempting to infiltrate various bases to reach the diamond at the end. I know. It's weird. But it'll make sense once you start playing.

Controls: Mouse to aim, click to shoot. Press R to restart the level.

Credits: Google fonts for the "Koulen" font, Vital synthesizer's presets and musicradar drums for certain sound effects.
